Name: Spaghetti Carbonara
RecipeIngredientParts: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, pancetta, pepper
RecipeInstructions: Boil pasta. Cook pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything in a pan and toss.

Name: Chicken Curry
RecipeIngredientParts: chicken, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, curry powder, coconut milk
RecipeInstructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and brown it. Add spices and tomato. Simmer with coconut milk.

Name: Veggie Stir Fry
RecipeIngredientParts: broccoli, bell pepper, soy sauce, garlic, tofu, sesame oil
RecipeInstructions: Sauté garlic. Add tofu and cook until golden. Add vegetables and stir-fry. Finish with soy sauce.

Name: Pancakes
RecipeIngredientParts: flour, eggs, milk, sugar, butter, baking powder, salt
RecipeInstructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs and milk. Stir into batter. Cook on a hot griddle until golden.

Name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
RecipeInstructions: Butter bread slices. Place cheese in between. Grill on pan until golden and crispy.

Name: Tomato Soup
RecipeIngredientParts: tomatoes, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cream, salt, pepper
RecipeInstructions: Cook onions and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer and blend. Add cream and season to taste.

Name: Egg Fried Rice
RecipeIngredientParts: rice, eggs, green peas, soy sauce, oil, green onion
RecipeInstructions: Scramble eggs. Add rice and vegetables. Stir-fry and add soy sauce.

Name: Fruit Smoothie
RecipeInstructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

Name: Mac and Cheese
RecipeIngredientParts: macaroni, cheddar cheese, milk, butter, flour, salt
RecipeInstructions: Cook macaroni. Make cheese sauce with butter, flour, milk, and cheese. Mix and bake.

Name: Omelette
RecipeIngredientParts: eggs, salt, pepper, cheese, spinach, onion
RecipeInstructions: Beat eggs. Add ingredients. Cook on pan until set.

Name: Tuna Salad
RecipeIngredientParts: tuna, mayonnaise, onion, celery, salt, pepper
RecipeInstructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Serve chilled or on bread.

Name: Mango Lassi
RecipeInstructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve cold.

Name: Grilled Chicken
RecipeIngredientParts: chicken breast, olive oil, garlic, lemon, salt, pepper
RecipeInstructions: Marinate chicken. Grill on medium heat until cooked through.

Name: Chocolate Mug Cake
RecipeIngredientParts: flour, cocoa powder, sugar, milk, oil, baking powder, vanilla
RecipeInstructions: Mix ingredients in mug. Microwave for 1-2 minutes.

Name: Cucumber Raita
RecipeInstructions: Grate cucumber and mix with yogurt and spices. Serve cold.
